name: elevator-key
effect: Unlocks the elevator in Lysandre Labs.
short_effect: Unlocks the elevator in Lysandre Labs.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A card key that activates the elevator in Lysandre Labs. It is emblazoned with Team Flare’s logo.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A card key that activates the elevator in Lysandre Labs. It is emblazoned with Team Flare’s logo.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A card key that activates the elevator in Lysandre Labs. It is emblazoned with Team Flare’s logo.
